abstract: win a copy of playerunknown 's battlegrounds for xbox one .
article: cogconnected contest -- win a copy of playerunknown 's battlegrounds for xbox one . winner winner , turkey dinner ! at least , that 's what one of our lucky readers will be saying after they win a digital copy of playerunknown 's battlegrounds for xbox one . this awesome , game-of-the-year contending , xbox one console exclusive is a must have for all xbox one shooter fans ! pubg is a battle royale style game that pits you against every other player on a massive island . you 'll have to loot through buildings to score weapons and armor .

the last one alive wins . do n't really feel like going it alone ? you 'll be able to team up with a buddy in duos or squads . the games still in development too , so more content is on the way . there 's a good chance we 'll be enjoying pubg for years to come . be sure to check out our preview of pubg for more info . while we should be dropping 100 readers onto an island and make them all fight to the death to earn a copy of pubg , we 're in the christmas spirit , so we 'll allow people to enter via the entry options below .
